Text: good call on the .mp3s for season 6 and 7...didn't even notice that...shiem, is it possible to get the .avi or .mkv up for these?  thanks in advance!!

I think they are ok.  The sizes are way too big for mp3's, and when I do a "file" on them, I get the same file type as the other episodes/seasons.  Try just renaming them to ".avi" and they should work fine.
If you use VLC, there's no problem
